gmd:hierarchyLevelName.gco:CharacterString: Highest level of data collection, from a common set of sensors or instrumentation, usually within the same research project

gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gmx:Anchor: GT10-11 - Particulate Po Pb from the U.S. GEOTRACES NAT project of the U.S. GEOTRACES program

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Particulate 210Po and 210Pb from US GEOTRACES North Atlantic KN199-04 and KN204-01 Dataset Description: <p>Please note that data may not be final, pending intercalibration&nbsp;results and further analysis. If you are interested in following&nbsp;changes to US GEOTRACES data, there is an RSS feed available&nbsp;from the <a href="http://www.bco-dmo.org/project/2066" target="_blank">GEOTRACES-NAT</a> project page.</p><p><strong>Version changes:</strong></p><p>Version 14June2013: The depth for KN204-01 pump samples was updated from target (nominal) depths to depths based on the final, corrected, and most accurate pump depth.&nbsp; The KN199-04 depths remain as the target (nominal) depths. See the <a href="http://osprey.bcodmo.org/dataset.cfm?id=14269&amp;flag=viewa" target="_blank">particle composition</a> dataset in the Sampling section for further details.</p> Acquisition Description: <p>Currently the recommended assay of both dissolved and particulate seawater samples are outlined in GEOTRACES procedures manual at:<br /><a href="http://www.obs-vlfr.fr/GEOTRACES/science/intercalibration/222-sampling-and-sample-handling-protocols-for-geotraces-cruises" target="_blank">http://www.obs-vlfr.fr/GEOTRACES/science/intercalibration/222-sampling-and-sample-handling-protocols-for-geotraces-cruises</a><br />It is also published in Baskaran, M., T.M. Church, G.-H. Hong, A. Kumar, M. Qiang, H. Choi, S. Rigaud, K. Maiti (2013). Effects of flow rates and composition of the filter, and decay/in-growth correction factors involved with the determination of in-situ particulate 210Po and 210Pb in seawater. Limnol. Oceanogr. (Methods), 11, 126-140.<br />&nbsp;</p>

gmd:credit.gmx:Anchor: Funding provided by NSF Ocean Sciences (NSF OCE) Award Number: OCE-0961351 Award URL: http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward.do?AwardNumber=0961351

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Access Constraints: none. Use Constraints: Please follow guidelines at: http://www.bco-dmo.org/terms-use Distribution liability: Under no circumstances shall BCO-DMO be liable for any direct, incidental, special, consequential, indirect, or punitive damages that result from the use of, or the inability to use, the materials in this data submission. If you are dissatisfied with any materials in this data submission your sole and exclusive remedy is to discontinue use.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: GEOTRACES is a SCOR sponsored program; and funding for program infrastructure development is provided by the U.S. National Science Foundation.GEOTRACES gained momentum following a special symposium, S02: Biogeochemical cycling of trace elements and isotopes in the ocean and applications to constrain contemporary marine processes (GEOSECS II), at a 2003 Goldschmidt meeting convened in Japan. The GEOSECS II acronym referred to the Geochemical Ocean Section Studies To determine full water column distributions of selected trace elements and isotopes, including their concentration, chemical speciation, and physical form, along a sufficient number of sections in each ocean basin to establish the principal relationships between these distributions and with more traditional hydrographic parameters;* To evaluate the sources, sinks, and internal cycling of these species and thereby characterize more completely the physical, chemical and biological processes regulating their distributions, and the sensitivity of these processes to global change; and* To understand the processes that control the concentrations of geochemical species used for proxies of the past environment, both in the water column and in the substrates that reflect the water column.GEOTRACES will be global in scope, consisting of ocean sections complemented by regional process studies. Sections and process studies will combine fieldwork, laboratory experiments and modelling. Beyond realizing the scientific objectives identified above, a natural outcome of this work will be to build a community of marine scientists who understand the processes regulating trace element cycles sufficiently well to exploit this knowledge reliably in future interdisciplinary studies.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: BCO-DMO catalogue of parameters from GT10-11 - Particulate Po Pb from the U.S. GEOTRACES NAT project of the U.S. GEOTRACES program

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34173.rdf Name: cruise_id Units: dimensionless Description: Official cruise identifier e.g. KN199-04 = R/V Knorr cruise number 199-04 http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34174.rdf Name: cruise_name Units: dimensionless Description: project designated cruise name http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34175.rdf Name: station_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: GEOTRACES station number http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34176.rdf Name: depth Units: meters Description: final depth of pump sample. For KN199-4: reported depth is the target depth from wire out. For KN204-1: reported depth is corrected depth using RBR data loggers. http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34177.rdf Name: cast_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: Cast identifier numbered consecutively within a station. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34178.rdf Name: lat Units: decimal degrees Description: latitude; North is positive http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34179.rdf Name: lon Units: decimal degrees Description: longitude; East is positive http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34180.rdf Name: event_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: Unique identifying number for US GEOTRACES sampling events; ranges from 2001 to 2225 for KN199-04 events and from 3001 to 3282 for KN204-01 events. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34181.rdf Name: sample_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: Unique identifying number for US GEOTRACES samples http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34182.rdf Name: sample_bottle_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: Unique identification numbers given to samples taken from bottles; ranges from 1 to 24; often used synonymously with bottle number. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34183.rdf Name: bottle_GEOTRC Units: dimensionless Description: Alphanumeric characters identifying bottle type (e.g. NIS representing Niskin and GF representing GOFLO) and position on a CTD rosette. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34184.rdf Name: Po_210 Units: dpm (nuclear decays per minute)/100 kilgrams Description: particulate Polonium-210 activity http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34185.rdf Name: Po_210_sd Units: dpm/100 kilgrams Description: particulate Polonium-210 activity error http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34186.rdf Name: Pb_210 Units: dpm/100 kilgrams Description: particulate Lead-210 activity http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34187.rdf Name: Pb_210_sd Units: dpm/100 kilgrams Description: particulate Lead-210 activity error http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34188.rdf Name: Po_Pb_ratio Units: dimensionless Description: activity ratio of Polonium to Lead http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34189.rdf Name: Po_Pb_ratio_sd Units: dimensionless Description: activity ratio of Polonium to Lead error http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/34190.rdf Name: BTL_ISO_DateTime_UTC Units: YYYY-mm-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSZ Description: Date and time (UTC) variable recorded at the bottle sampling time in ISO compliant format. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). This standard is based on ISO 8601:2004(E) and takes on the following form: 2009-08-30T14:05:00[.xx]Z (UTC time) http://lod.bco-dmo.org/id/dataset-parameter/35286.rdf Name: instr Units: unitless Description: instrument used for sample collection:McL-Prof = McLane Profiler;30-ODF = Ocean Data Facility 12 bottle 30 liter Niskin rosette.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: GB/NERC/BODC > British Oceanographic Data Centre, Natural Environment Research Council, United Kingdom

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P09/current/DEPH/ Name: DEPTH BELOW SEA SURFACE Description: The distance of a sensor or sampling point below the sea surface. http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P09/current/LATX/ Name: LATITUDE Description: The angular distance north or south from the equator, measured along the meridian of the point of interest. http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P09/current/LONX/ Name: LONGITUDE Description: The angular distance east or west east or west of Greenwich to the point of interest. http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P02/current/ACYC/ Name: Reference numbers Description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P02/current/ACYC/ Name: Reference numbers Description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P03/current/C035/ Name: Metal and metalloid concentrations Description: Parameters pertaining to metal and trace metalloid (i.e. excluding Si) concentrations in any material. http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P03/current/C035/ Name: Metal and metalloid concentrations Description: Parameters pertaining to metal and trace metalloid (i.e. excluding Si) concentrations in any material. http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P01/current/DTUT8601/ Name: Date and time (UT in ISO8601 format to sub-second precision) Description: String corresponding to format 'yyyy-mm-ddThh:mi:ss.sss' optionally terminated by 'Z'

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: PI-supplied Description: Official cruise identifier e.g. KN199-04 = R/V Knorr cruise number 199-04; General Description: cruise designation; name

PI-supplied Description: project designated cruise name; General Description: The cruise_name is a local name chosen by project investigators for a research expedition on a vessel, as opposed to the formal/official cruise ID asserted by the vessel operator.
PI-supplied Description: GEOTRACES station number; General Description: consecutive station number

PI-supplied Description: final depth of pump sample. For KN199-4: reported depth is the target depth from wire out. For KN204-1: reported depth is corrected depth using RBR data loggers.; General Description: observation/sample depth, in meters; best estimate; usually but not always calculated from pressure; calculated either from CTD pressure using Fofonoff and Millard (1982; UNESCO Tech Paper #44) algorithm adjusted for 1980 equation of state for seawater (EOS80) or simply equivalent to nominal depth as recorded during sampling if CTD pressure was unavailable NERC Description: The distance of a sensor or sampling point below the sea surface.

PI-supplied Description: Cast identifier numbered consecutively within a station. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description).; General Description: cast or profile number

PI-supplied Description: latitude; North is positive; General Description: latitude, in decimal degrees, North is positive, negative denotes South; Reported in some datasets as degrees, minutes NERC Description: The angular distance north or south from the equator, measured along the meridian of the point of interest.

PI-supplied Description: longitude; East is positive; General Description: longitude, in decimal degrees, East is positive, negative denotes West; Reported in some datsets as degrees, minutes NERC Description: The angular distance east or west east or west of Greenwich to the point of interest.

PI-supplied Description: Unique identifying number for US GEOTRACES sampling events; ranges from 2001 to 2225 for KN199-04 events and from 3001 to 3282 for KN204-01 events. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description).; General Description: event or operation number; often derived from date/time (MMDDHHmm) of sampling and when combined with year (YYYY) is a unique sampling identifier/data processing key. Date/time is not necessarily in GMT.

PI-supplied Description: Unique identifying number for US GEOTRACES samples; General Description: unique sample identification or number; any combination of alpha numeric characters; precise definition is file dependent NERC Description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers

PI-supplied Description: Unique identification numbers given to samples taken from bottles; ranges from 1 to 24; often used synonymously with bottle number. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description).; General Description: unique sample identification or number; any combination of alpha numeric characters; precise definition is file dependent NERC Description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers

PI-supplied Description: Alphanumeric characters identifying bottle type (e.g. NIS representing Niskin and GF representing GOFLO) and position on a CTD rosette. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description).; General Description: water bottle number, generally assigned to a position on a CTD rosette, identifies all samples drawn from a given bottle

PI-supplied Description: particulate Polonium-210 activity; General Description: Concentration of a trace metal in seawater. Refer to dataset for element name and units. NERC Description: Parameters pertaining to metal and trace metalloid (i.e. excluding Si) concentrations in any material.

PI-supplied Description: particulate Polonium-210 activity error; General Description: Standard deviation reported for the concentration of a trace metal in seawater. Refer to dataset for element and units.

PI-supplied Description: particulate Lead-210 activity; General Description: Concentration of a trace metal in seawater. Refer to dataset for element name and units. NERC Description: Parameters pertaining to metal and trace metalloid (i.e. excluding Si) concentrations in any material.

PI-supplied Description: particulate Lead-210 activity error; General Description: Standard deviation reported for the concentration of a trace metal in seawater. Refer to dataset for element and units.
PI-supplied Description: activity ratio of Polonium to Lead; General Description: association with a community-wide standard parameter is not yet defined
PI-supplied Description: activity ratio of Polonium to Lead error; General Description: association with a community-wide standard parameter is not yet defined

gco:attributeType.xlink:title: Date and time (UT in ISO8601 format to sub-second precision)

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: PI-supplied Description: Date and time (UTC) variable recorded at the bottle sampling time in ISO compliant format. Values were added from the intermediate US GEOTRACES master file (see Processing Description). This standard is based on ISO 8601:2004(E) and takes on the following form: 2009-08-30T14:05:00[.xx]Z (UTC time); General Description: Date/Time (UTC) ISO formattedThis standard is based on ISO 8601:2004(E) and takes on any of the following forms:2009-08-30T09:05:00[.xx] (local time)2009-08-30T14:05:00[.xx]Z (UTC time)2009-08-30T14:05:00[.xx]-05:00The dashes and the colons can be dropped.The T can also be dropped "by mutual agreement", but one needs the trailing Z if the time is UTC.Sample ISO_datetime_utc:2009-08-30T14:05:00[.xx]Z (UTC time)Format: YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS[.xx]Z (UTC time) NERC Description: String corresponding to format 'yyyy-mm-ddThh:mi:ss.sss' optionally terminated by 'Z'

PI-supplied Description: instrument used for sample collection:McL-Prof = McLane Profiler;30-ODF = Ocean Data Facility 12 bottle 30 liter Niskin rosette.; General Description: instrument used to collect or process data, definition is specific to the data set in which it appears

gmd:organisationName.gmx:Anchor: Biological and Chemical Oceanography Data Management Office (BCO-DMO)

gmd:contactInstructions.gco:CharacterString: For questions regarding this resource, please contact BCO-DMO via the email address provided.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: <p>Currently the recommended assay of both dissolved and particulate seawater samples are outlined in GEOTRACES procedures manual at:<br /><a href="http://www.obs-vlfr.fr/GEOTRACES/science/intercalibration/222-sampling-and-sample-handling-protocols-for-geotraces-cruises" target="_blank">http://www.obs-vlfr.fr/GEOTRACES/science/intercalibration/222-sampling-and-sample-handling-protocols-for-geotraces-cruises</a><br />It is also published in Baskaran, M., T.M. Church, G.-H. Hong, A. Kumar, M. Qiang, H. Choi, S. Rigaud, K. Maiti (2013). Effects of flow rates and composition of the filter, and decay/in-growth correction factors involved with the determination of in-situ particulate 210Po and 210Pb in seawater. Limnol. Oceanogr. (Methods), 11, 126-140.<br />&nbsp;</p>

<p>The calculated activities were corrected for in-growth, decay, chemical recoveries, filter and reagent blanks and detector background (all details are outlined by Baskaran et al. (2013) given above).</p>

gmd:organisationName.gmx:Anchor: Biological and Chemical Oceanography Data Management Office (BCO-DMO)

gmd:contactInstructions.gco:CharacterString: For questions regarding this resource, please contact BCO-DMO via the email address provided.

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: PI Supplied Instrument Name: CTD Sea-Bird PI Supplied Instrument Description:A self-recording Seabird 19plus CTD, deployed at the end of the line for both cruises. Instrument Name: CTD Sea-Bird Instrument Short Name:CTD Sea-Bird Instrument Description: Conductivity, Temperature, Depth (CTD) sensor package from SeaBird Electronics, no specific unit identified. This instrument designation is used when specific make and model are not known. See also other SeaBird instruments listed under CTD. More information from Sea-Bird Electronics. Community Standard Description: http://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/L05/current/130/

PI Supplied Instrument Name: McLane Pump Instrument Name: McLane Pump Instrument Short Name:McLane Pump Instrument Description: McLane pumps sample large volumes of seawater at depth. They are attached to a wire and lowered to different depths in the ocean. As the water is pumped through the filter, particles suspended in the ocean are collected on the filters. The pumps are then retrieved and the contents of the filters are analyzed in a lab.

gmd:title.gmx:Anchor: International Council for the Exploration of the Sea
